publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-985 Carolyn Leckie: Nursery Nurses, A Just Claim-That the Parliament agrees that the nursery nurses have a just claim and that there should be a fair, nationally negotiated settlement to their current dispute.

S2M-985 Carolyn Leckie: Nursery Nurses, A Just Claim-That the Parliament agrees that the nursery nurses have a just claim and that there should be a fair, nationally negotiated settlement to their current dispute.
S2M-985 Nursery Nurses, A Just Claim (lodged on 2 March 2004) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Colin Fox*
S2M-985 Nursery Nurses, A Just Claim (lodged on 2 March 2004) Frances Curran*
